content.question: Which of the following would best support the authorâ€™s claim about the distinctions between eastern and western Europe in the second paragraph?

choices.label: The withdrawal of most of the American and Soviet troops from Germany at the end of the Cold War
The admission of Poland and other former communist states into the European Union
The separation of the Baltic States and Ukraine from Russia after the collapse of the Soviet Union
The creation of a unified currency, the euro, for members of the European Union

content.answer: The admission of Poland and other former communist states into the European Union

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Explain how claims or evidence support, modify, or refute a source's argument.
